document.full_text: shooting rampage suspect jared loughner was dragged shouting from a courtroom on wednesday before he was found mentally incompetent to stand trial on charges he killed six people and wounded arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords.
document.title: alleged tucson shooter ruled incompetent for trial
lines_and_colors: shooting rampage suspect jared loughner was dragged shouting from a courtroom on wednesday before he was found mentally incompetent to stand trial on charges he killed six people and wounded arizona congresswoman gabrielle giffords.
